price: 52. So obey not the disbelievers, but strive against them (by preaching) with the utmost endeavour with it (the Qur’ân).
arabic: فَلَا تُطِعِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ وَجَٰهِدۡهُم بِهِۦ جِهَادٗا كَبِيرٗا

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: falā tuṭiʿi al-kāfirīna wajāhid'hum bihi jihādan kabīran
